name: luisgen
description: LUISGen is a tool for generating C# class or Typescript interface for a LUIS app to make consuming LUIS output easier.
author: Microsoft
comments: There is a bug in handling .njsproj in dotnet so we need to expand into each project rather than just using the solution.

scripts.test: dotnet test src/LUISGenTest/LUISGenTest.csproj && cd src/LUISGenTestJS/ && npm run-script build && npm run-script test
scripts.clean: dotnet clean src/LUISGen/LUISGen.csproj && dotnet clean src/LUISGenTest/LUISGenTest.csproj && cd src/LUISGenTestJS/ && npm run clean
